call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist collected intake information for a slip and fall incident and attempted to transfer the caller to the intake team. When the transfer failed because no one was available, the receptionist informed the caller that the information would be passed to the attorneys for a follow-up call.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to the intake department, but returned to the line after no one was available to take the call.
